name: Mola's Great Dive
description:
Made for the Mini Jam Game Jam. I implemented the limitation of "Health is a tool" by grouping both health and stamina together into one bar. You can go at a normal speed to preserve health, or sacrifice health for a quick burst of speed to get away from predators. Plankton help restore your health/stamina and are a constant necessity on your way down to the bottom of the Marianas Trench! (I just realized I forgot to implement a victory screen! If you get to 11,054m you win)

This is my very first original game that I've completed so I'd appreciate any and all critiques and advice. This was a really fun project and I look forward to making many more! :)
